biotools.summary: This open source software package automatically analyses single force curves or entire force volume maps to yield the corresponding elasticity and deformability images. The principal characteristic of the package is a large adaptability to the various experimental setups and to different analysis methodologies.

bioschemas.name: FC_analysis
